Our workshop situated at the Westville Country Club at the Eco trails opposite Cadence. No 1 Link Road, Westville.

title: 2021 GIANT TALON E+29ER 1 TRAIL BIKE
text: The trail is calling, and here’s how to answer. This balanced, smooth-riding E-bike gives you a natural-feeling boost of power and total control, so you can have more fun and expand your off-road riding capabilities.With a lightweight aluminum frame that blends classic hardtail design with modern E-bike technology, Talon E+ 29 delivers comfort and confidence on off-road terrain. Perfect for bike paths or XC trails, it features a SyncDrive Core motor system that makes those hard climbs easier and encourages you to extend your ride time. It’s designed for a 100mm suspension fork to smooth out the bumps, and its 29-inch wheels give it a stable, balanced ride quality. The side-release EnergyPak battery is integrated into the frame and can be easily removed for charging. And the RideControl ONE control lets you adjust settings as you ride.MotorGiant SyncDrive CoreControllerGiant RideControl One ANT+DisplayGiant RideControlOne ANT+BatteryGiant EnergyPak 500Wh, Side-ReleaseSizesS, M, L, XL ,XXLColorsBalsam GreenFrameALUXX aluminum, Overdrive 1½ - 1?" head tube, integrated KS18 kickstand mountForkSR Suntour XCR 32 LO-R Boost 29 100mm travel, Tapered 1½ - 1?" steerer, lockoutShockN/AHandlebarGiant Connect TR Riser 31.8x690~750mmStemGiant ContactSeatpostGiant 30.9mm, 2-bolt Micro Adjustable, Forged AluminiumSaddleGiant SportPedalsAluminum PlatformShiftersShimano DeoreFront Derailleur-Rear DerailleurShimano Deore, 10-Speed, Shadow+BrakesShimano BR-MT200, hydraulic disc, 180mmBrake LeversShimano BL-MT200CassetteShimano HG50-10, 11-42T, 10-SpeedChainKMC e.10 Sport, e-bike optimizedCranksetForged Alloy minimal Q-factor, 36TBottom BracketN/ARimsGiant GX03VHubsGiant eTracker Sport, [F] 15mm Thru-Axle [R] 9mm QR, e-bike optimizedSpokesStainless steelTiresMaxxis Rekon 29x2.4" Wire Bead 60TPIExtrasGiant EnergyPak 4A Fast ChargerWeightThe most accurate way to determine any bike’s weight is to have your local dealer weigh it for you. Many brands strive to list the lowest possible weight, but in reality weight can vary based on size, finish, hardware and accessories. All our bikes are designed for best-in-class weight and ride quality.We Deliver Nationwide! title: 26" Silverback Alpine, Large Frame, Shimano 24spd, Hydraulic Brakes
text:
This Silverback Alpine is in good condition.  Well maintained German designed bike and it's serviced and ready to ride.  

Few minor scratches but the drivetrain L, brakes etc are very low milage.  It comes with:

-Large lightweight and strong aluminum alloy 17.5" Silverback Frame
-SR Suntour XCM V3 coil spring fork with lockout
-Shimano Hydraulic Disk Brakes front and back
-Shimano rapid fire shifter 3 and 8 speed
-Shimano Alivio rear and SiS 8 speed deraileurs in front
-Shimano SiS 3 speed alloy crankset
-Double walled aluminum alloy rims with Shimano Alloy hubs (quick release)
-CST MTB all purpose MTB tyres in good condition
-Alloy Silverback saddle, clamp, stem and handlebars

THE PRICE IS SLIGHTLY NEGOTIABLE AND DELIVERY CAN BE ARRANGED.

title: 2021 GIANT STANCE E+2 29ER
text: Steep climbs, technical descents, longer days on the trail. With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. The EnergyPak battery system lets you extend the ride, and now you can charge it up quickly with a newly designed smart charger.MotorGiant SyncDrive SportControllerGiant RideControl One ANT+DisplayWireless display compatibleBatteryGiant EnergyPak Smart 500, 36V Integrated Lithium-IonSizesS, M, L, XLColorsBalsam GreenFrameALUXX SL-grade aluminum, 120mm FlexPoint suspension systemForkSR Suntour XCR 34 Air LO-R, 130mm travel, tapered steerer, Lockout, 110x15 Quick-Loc thru-axleShockRockShox Monarch R, High Volume, 184x44mm, custom tunedHandlebarGiant Connect TR Riser 31.8x780mmStemGiant ContactSeatpostGiant 30.9mm, 2-bolt Micro Adjustable, Forged AluminiumSaddleGiant SportPedalsAluminum PlatformShiftersShimano DeoreFront DerailleurGiant Custom Chain GuideRear DerailleurShimano Deore, 10-Speed, Shadow+BrakesTektro HD-M745 Orion, 4-piston, hydraulic disc, 203mmBrake LeversTektro HD-M745 OrionCassetteShimano CS-M4100-10, 11-46T, 10-SpeedChainKMC e.10 Sport, e-bike optimizedCranksetForged Alloy minimal Q-factor, 36T Steel Direct Mount ring (S:160, M/L:165, XL:170)Bottom BracketN/ARimsGiant XCT 29 Tubeless Ready 25mm e-bike optimizedHubsGiant eTracker Sport, [F] 15mm Thru-Axle [R] 141mm QRSpokesStainless SteelTiresMaxxis Rekon 29x2.4" foldable, 60tpi, EXO, Tubeless ReadyExtrasGiant EnergyPak 6A Smart chargerWeightThe most accurate way to determine any bike’s weight is to have your local dealer weigh it for you. Many brands strive to list the lowest possible weight, but in reality weight can vary based on size, finish, hardware and accessories. All our bikes are designed for best-in-class weight and ride quality.We Deliver Nationwide! title: Titan Calypso 20 inch bike in great condition for sale
text:
Titan Calypso 20 inch bike in great condition for sale. This really is a wonderful little bike that my daughter had lots of fun with. She has outgrown it now. It’s still in perfect shape and working condition.

KEY FEATURES
Lightweight Hydroformed Aluminium Frame is designed to withstand all the bumps, knocks and crashes your little shredder throws at it. A low stand over heights aids children’s confidence.
SR Suntour Front Suspension Fork smoothes the ride.
Shimano 6 Speed Gears are robust and offer a wide range of gears for any obstacle.
Tektro V-brakes are proven to work and they are made from metal which can withstand more abuse than a plastic brake.
TR Junior Grips are designed to meet the needs of a young rider. A smaller diameter and softer compound means a better grip. 
Selle Royal Saddle provides extra comfort when your child is learning to ride.
Adjustable Saddle & Seat Post make the bike adjustable as your child grows.
Multi-user 5 Year Warranty ensures that you are buying quality.
location: Sea Point & Three Anchor Bay, Atlantic Seaboard, Western Cape

text:
Cycle Science Westville 
Bicycle Service & Repairs 
1 Link road,  Westville, Durban 

Our workshop situated at the Westville Country Club at the Eco trails opposite Cadence. No 1 Link Road, Westville.

We offer the following services at competitive rates: 

Major Service 
Minor Service 

FREE Bike collection and delivery anywhere in Durban and surrounds 

Additional Services:
• Suspension Service - Quotation depending on work needed
• Wheel Hub Service 
• Wheel truing 
• Gear/Derailleur Calibration 
• All repairs and general maintenance
• Wash and Lube 
• Custom Bike builds
• Full Bicycle restorations
• Replacement parts fitted 

Minor Service:
• Wash n Lube
• Overall diagnostic check
• Front and rear Gears reset
• True Rims
• Check all pivots and moving parts 

Major service - includes Minor service plus:
• Full frame strip down and clean
• Chain & cassette removed & cleaned
• Bottom bracket & headset service
• Derailleurs cleaned & lubed
• Pivot bearings & bushings serviced
• Replace gear cables.

title: Trek Fuel EX 5.5
text:
Product Details
Components
ChainBontrager Ranger
PedalsAluminum platform w/clips and straps
TiresBontrager Jones XR, 26 x 2.2
HubsShimano M495
CassetteSRAM PG950, 9-speed: 11-34
Rear ShockFox Float RP2, 120mm-travel
HandlebarBontrager Race
Handlebar StemBontrager SSR
SaddleBontrager Race Basic
BrakesetShimano hydraulic discs
Frame Tubing MaterialTrek Alpha Red Series aluminum
Shift LeversShimano Deore
Factory Description
Open up a whole new level of trail fun with Trek's Fuel EX 5.5. It boasts Trek's super-efficient full-suspension technology with a Fox shock delivering 120mm of travel and a RockShox Tora up front to make the bumps disappear. Complementing the trick frame is a slick-shifting Shimano drivetrain, powerful Shimano disc brakes for maximum stopping power regardless of the conditions, and a host of light and durable Bontrager components. Plus, the light Bonty wheels tackle buffed-out singletrack, rough rocky sections and everything in between.

title: Formula 33  Mountain bike fork (26"er)
text: Wheel Size26"Suspension Travel120 mmExcellent condition Italian made, lightweight 26-inch/27,5er Formula 33 XC/trail fork for sale. 100-120mm internally adjustable travel, 15mm thru axle, 1,5 inch tapered steerer. Weighing in at only 1580g the ThirtyThree is a very light fork, while the 33mm stanchions and magnesium lower legs give it exceptional strength and zero flex. A combination of exacting tolerances, low-friction seals and a hybrid air/coil spring system ensures a very plush, smooth stroke and responsive travel, making the ThirtyThree a very active fork. 21 click rebound adjustment, 12 click high and low speed compression adjustment. Exceptionally easy to service. Has seen little us.Fitted as standard equipment on Fondriest XC bike. Spares and service available at Chris Willemse Cycles, Cape Town. Retails for 799 Euro/R13500!Steerer Length190mmAxle Type15mm Thru-axleSteerer TypeTapered

Towbar bike rack The basic, quick and easy to use bike carrier for 2 bikes
Features:
- Soft, protective frame holders keep the bikes in place.
- Pre-assembled with strap, and reflectors included for extra safety.
- Bikes are at convenient height from the ground.
- Folds flat for easy storage and handling.
- Use Thule Bike Frame Adapter 982 for fitting of bikes with non-standard frames (e.g. ladies bikes, BMXs, downhill bikes).

- Max Number of bikes: 2
- Load Capacity: 30kg
- Max bike weight: 15kg

title: Bicycle Service/Repairs/Maintenance
text: I service/repair/rebuild and do upgrades on bicycles.  I offer a collect and deliver service as well.  No work is carried out without acceptance of quotes.  How does this work?  If you drop your bicycle for work to be done, I will assess what needs to be done and provide you with a quote.  If you accept the quote, work goes forward.  If you decline, you are welcome to come collect your bicycle at no cost.  If I collected your bicycle and you decline my quote, there will be a small collect and deliver fee of R150 depending on area.Collections are done in selected areas.Feel free to whatsapp me for any additional information.  I am based in Goodwood.Included pictures are some of the work I have done.Regards,  Danté

title: 26" Giant Thermal1, Large Frame, Shimano 24spd, Disk Brakes
text:
This Giant Thermal 1 is a great starter bike.  Giant is a tip brand and this is a full aluminum bike with Disk brakes.  It's used and has the normal scratches here and there. 

It's just been serviced, new brake, gear cables and housings and new tubes.  It is ready to ride and it comes with:

-Large 19" lightweight and durable 6061 aluminium Giant frame
-Manitou slate coilspring fork with lockout
-Shimano Rapid fire 8 and 3 speed shifters (indicator cover on the left shifter is broken, see pics) 
-Shimano Deore Rear and Alivio front deraileurs 
-Shimano Alivio 2 speed crankset with Alloy arms
-Giant Double walled aluminum alloy rims with Alloy hubs
-Brand New rear tyre and front tyre in good condition 
-Alloy saddle post and clamp.  
-WTB Saddle with a slight nick on one side
-Alloy Giant stem and habdlebars with new grippers

THE PRICE IS SLIGHTLY NEGOTIABLE.

title: Touring Bike and accessories
text: I am selling my beloved Trek 3500 bike. It has been modified to suit (ideally) someone interested in bike touring/bike-packing. - The bike is a Trek3500 Mountain bike with 27,5 wheels (good for gravel/longer distances) - The bike is fitted with the incredible Rohloff speedhub 500/14 which is ideal for touring (https://www.cyclemonkey.com/rohloff). It has done about 4500km.  - Solid back rack as well as 2 x Ortlieb Waterproof panniers (25L each) - Front handlebar rack  - Helmet - small air pump - small saddle bag (with spares/tools/tyre etc) This bike is ready and set to be used on a weekend or longer tour around RSA or abroad.Only those passionate about bike touring/packing should consider this a viable option as this bike is designed specifically for that.
